d4bd1973-5521-4002-8081-425ffbee0a57.name: Combat Reflexes
d4bd1973-5521-4002-8081-425ffbee0a57.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

8a1094e9-bbef-4fe7-910c-99393465f342.name: Directional
8a1094e9-bbef-4fe7-910c-99393465f342.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

b0625462-6f2a-4ee7-acca-2e2ed4f6408d.name: Fit
b0625462-6f2a-4ee7-acca-2e2ed4f6408d.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

04efde4f-0f0f-4386-9392-20fb68b5985c.name: Fit, Very
04efde4f-0f0f-4386-9392-20fb68b5985c.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

3d268840-9203-4613-bbf9-91223735bc28.name: High Pain Threshold
3d268840-9203-4613-bbf9-91223735bc28.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

00e75523-f405-44ad-b689-463f178ec1af.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

25996b3c-2c2f-49a3-b0df-faa4d1f0069e.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

9507b4aa-1546-4209-99f0-e29c37e64b64.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

7a7c77f7-23cb-4f41-b3a0-79e1844e1665.name: Wise Master
7a7c77f7-23cb-4f41-b3a0-79e1844e1665.notes: Choose 20 points. You can add your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

b98686f4-06dd-40bb-9dd5-1646bd5ca0bd.name: Luck, Extraordinary
b98686f4-06dd-40bb-9dd5-1646bd5ca0bd.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

a903df46-0181-470b-a4e7-57d744df34a1.name: Directional
a903df46-0181-470b-a4e7-57d744df34a1.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

64edf8a0-b0d7-44fb-9f62-adc37f23d7ca.name: Luck
64edf8a0-b0d7-44fb-9f62-adc37f23d7ca.notes: Usable once per hour of play

eb7317ae-408f-4aa3-9f37-7f5fdce8dc32.name: Chummy
eb7317ae-408f-4aa3-9f37-7f5fdce8dc32.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

26a885e0-aad2-41f4-a746-8927d4141ea9.name: Obsession
26a885e0-aad2-41f4-a746-8927d4141ea9.notes: @Beat a specific rival or win a specific tournament

b55664fc-74db-413e-9ebe-2a21bacc6475.name: Martial Arts Perks
b55664fc-74db-413e-9ebe-2a21bacc6475.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Skills.

ecb096c6-2215-4fb1-a1c5-dd298f4645d8.name: Cowpoker
ecb096c6-2215-4fb1-a1c5-dd298f4645d8.notes: Must wear pointy-toed boots. Unarmed skill bonuses apply.

b7be8d26-063c-4a0d-9966-6ad0c34e260b.name: Deadly Pose
b7be8d26-063c-4a0d-9966-6ad0c34e260b.notes: Free Intimidation attempt upon takedown. -5 in combat. +2 for knockout. +5 for fatality.

19725be7-aec2-4cfb-b4b6-3253b57d96d7.name: Finishing Move (@Attack@)
19725be7-aec2-4cfb-b4b6-3253b57d96d7.notes: +1 per die of damage, but only upon disabled foes.

66a83d5b-d5ce-4899-8d8e-aa6ec6ce3e81.name: Focused Fury
66a83d5b-d5ce-4899-8d8e-aa6ec6ce3e81.notes: Combine Mighty Blows and All Out Attack

cdfd4b88-cc87-45da-98d0-7cff5ae49b7e.name: Trademark Move
cdfd4b88-cc87-45da-98d0-7cff5ae49b7e.notes: +1 to @One turn of detailed combat actions@

22f92220-d799-49d5-b18c-38db3e78d614.name: Choose 18 points
22f92220-d799-49d5-b18c-38db3e78d614.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

4c5d31d3-fff4-4364-8a5b-887defc95ce8.name: Intelligence
4c5d31d3-fff4-4364-8a5b-887defc95ce8.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

d7b15754-e664-4540-b9c7-9a3872deb043.name: Choose 16 points
d7b15754-e664-4540-b9c7-9a3872deb043.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

b2702aea-4e8c-4937-8c8f-9615b39a6184.name: Choose 18 points
b2702aea-4e8c-4937-8c8f-9615b39a6184.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

1955121f-dcde-4d43-9ed4-e9f34ada921c.name: Security
1955121f-dcde-4d43-9ed4-e9f34ada921c.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

16e9b8a3-0b3c-4ba6-b3c0-6c164f4c4a78.name: Wise Master
16e9b8a3-0b3c-4ba6-b3c0-6c164f4c4a78.notes: 20 points in your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

6f1996db-ec44-4279-a83c-fe9328bcac06.name: Martial Arts Skills
6f1996db-ec44-4279-a83c-fe9328bcac06.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Perks.

95396766-e011-4dd0-9213-e0d41c32b992.name: Judo
95396766-e011-4dd0-9213-e0d41c32b992.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

4b915095-3011-41e5-85ec-3fa21ba33ada.name: Choose five.
4b915095-3011-41e5-85ec-3fa21ba33ada.notes: Or four, and raise one by a level.
